description: Manage and configure IoT Central device attestation.

commands.name: az iot central device attestation create
commands.syntax:
az iot central device attestation create --app-id
                                         --content
                                         --device-id
                                         [--api-version {2022-06-30-preview, 2022-07-31}]
                                         [--central-api-uri]
                                         [--token]
examples: az iot central device attestation create --app-id {appid} --device-id {deviceid} --content {attestation}

commands.name: az iot central device attestation delete
commands.syntax:
az iot central device attestation delete --app-id
                                         --device-id
                                         [--api-version {2022-06-30-preview, 2022-07-31}]
                                         [--central-api-uri]
                                         [--token]
examples: az iot central device attestation delete --app-id {appid} --device-id {deviceid}

commands.name: az iot central device attestation show
commands.syntax:
az iot central device attestation show --app-id
                                       --device-id
                                       [--api-version {2022-06-30-preview, 2022-07-31}]
                                       [--central-api-uri]
                                       [--token]
examples: az iot central device attestation show --app-id {appid} --device-id {deviceid}

commands.name: az iot central device attestation update
commands.summary: Update an individual device attestation via patch.
commands.syntax:
az iot central device attestation update --app-id
                                         --content
                                         --device-id
                                         [--api-version {2022-06-30-preview, 2022-07-31}]
                                         [--central-api-uri]
                                         [--token]
examples: az iot central device attestation update --app-id {appid} --device-id {deviceid} --content {attestation}
